session.description: The session that was logged on to or logged off from.

status_detail.description:
The message attribute contains details about the success or failure of the logon or logoff. Possible details for Windows are:
  • Success
    • LOGOFF_USER_INITIATED
    • LOGOFF_OTHER
  • Failure
    • USER_DOES_NOT_EXIST
    • INVALID_CREDENTIALS
    • ACCOUNT_DISABLED
    • ACCOUNT_LOCKED_OUT
    • PASSWORD_EXPIRED

status_id.description: The cross-platform status of the logon or logoff operation.

description: User Session Activity events report when a user attempts a logon or logoff, successfully or otherwise.
name: User Session Activity
